question: Which cricketer has been named the Captain of the ICC’s Men’s T20I and ODI teams of the decade?
explanation:
The International Cricket Council (ICC) has recently announced the Men’s T20I and ODI teams of the decade.
Former India captain Mahendra Singh Dhoni has been named as the Captain of both the teams. Virat Kohli, Jasprit Bumrah and Rohit Sharma are the other Indians in the T20I team. The ICC’s ODI team also includes Indian batsmen Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma.
